sentences.en: An air of unstudied spontaneous utterance is apt to be painstakingly achieved.
sentences.cn: 一时冲动就脱口而出的说话风格自然很难让人接受.

sentences.en: But much about the impact of volcanic ash on jet engines remains unstudied.
sentences.cn: 但火山灰对喷气引擎的大部分影响仍有待研究.

sentences.en: She was utterly feminine and devastatingly attractive in an unstudied way.
sentences.cn: 她温存无比,魅力四射而又绝不矫揉造作.

words.tran_cn: 不故意做作的；自然的；优雅的

trans.tran_cn: 自然而不做作的，非学得的，即席而成的
